definition: (coll.) (of a couple) to display affection in public or by posting photos on social media
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
to issue a document/document issued by an authority/outgoing messages/(Internet) to post an article online
to make a public display of affection
to spar/to fight/to duke it out
to enquire solicitously about sb's well-being (idiom)/to pamper
